text: Nan adarasi, ian tav guizɨn akamɨn tuavim ategh pura akar igharazimɨn gɨn mangam, eghtɨ ian tav uam a inigh izɨ guizɨn akamɨn tuavim datɨgham, gumazir kam arazir bar aghuim gami. Ia akar kam deragh a gɨnɨghnɨgh! Ian tav gumazir arazir kurabagh amimɨn akuraghtɨma a tuavir kuram ategh ua God bagh izegham, gumazir kam, an arazir kurabagh amir gumazimɨn duamɨn akuraghtɨma an aremeghan kogham. Eghtɨ arazir kamra God arazir kurar avɨriba gɨn amadagham.(5:20) Marazi ghaze, Kraisɨn gɨn zuir darazi, men marazi Godɨn guizɨn akam ataki. Ezɨ Jems men arazibar kɨrasa, akɨnafarir kam osiri.
